/snap/clion/250/bin/cmake/linux/x64/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=/snap/clion/250/bin/ninja/linux/x64/ninja -G Ninja -S /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-robot -B /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-robot/cmake-build-debug
NOW
PICO_SDK_PATH         /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk
env(PICO_SDK_PATH)    /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk
NOW
COMMON_SRC_DIR    /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-robot/common
PICO_SDK_PATH is /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk
PICO platform is rp2040.
Build type is Debug
Using regular optimized debug build (set PICO_DEOPTIMIZED_DEBUG=1 to de-optimize)
PICO target board is pico.
Using board configuration from /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/src/boards/include/boards/pico.h
TinyUSB available at /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/lib/tinyusb/src/portable/raspberrypi/rp2040; enabling build support for USB.
Compiling TinyUSB with CFG_TUSB_DEBUG=1
BTstack available at /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/lib/btstack
cyw43-driver available at /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/lib/cyw43-driver
Pico W Bluetooth build support available.
lwIP available at /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/lib/lwip
mbedtls available at /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-sdk/lib/mbedtls
COMMON   /home/robert/pico/pico/pico-robot/common
